meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Doug Davies Karen Hedlund Jason Keller Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6272.

td.p: Doug Davies, an investment consultant from Monrovia, California
Karen Hedlund, a nursing tutor from Brooklyn, New York
Jason Keller, a tutor from Highland Park, New Jersey (whose 2-day cash winnings total $44,800)

tr.td: CLASSIC NOVELS
BROADWAY MUSICAL SETTINGS
WORD ORIGINS
PROJECT RUNAWAY
COLORS
PAPAL PEOPLE
(Alex: We'll give you the year; you identify the pope.)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Jason: What is A Room With a View?)
(Alex: [In a Transylvanian accent] [*]. I am [*], you are not.)
[Audience laughs]

Dracula

Jason
Triple Stumper
')
